sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Rating = ({ value, text }) => { return (
= 1 ? 'fas fas-star' : value >= 0.5 ? "fas fa-star-halt-alt" : "fas fa-start" } > = 2 ? 'fas fas-star' : value >= 1.5 ? "fas fa-star-halt-alt" : "fas fa-start" } > = 3 ? 'fas fas-star' : value >= 2.5 ? "fas fa-star-halt-alt" : "fas fa-start" } > = 4 ? 'fas fas-star' : value >= 3.5 ? "fas fa-star-halt-alt" : "fas fa-start" } > = 5 ? 'fas fas-star' : value >= 4.5 ? "fas fa-star-halt-alt" : "fas fa-start" } > { text && text }
) } export default Rating
